com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.oath

Interface SelectableKey

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DualSeedOathToken, DualSeedSoftOathToken

    public interface SelectableKey
    An interface that defines methods to select a key used by the object.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void selectKey(int index)
      Select a key used by the object.

    • Method Detail

      • selectKey

        void selectKey(int index)
        throws IdpException
        Select a key used by the object. It alters the state of this object only and does not alter the state of other instances representing the same data set.
        Parameters:
        index - the key index to use starting at 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the index is out of range.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when this function is called twice for the same object.
        IdpException - this is generic exception, you can directly catch this exception or catch each specific exception below.
        IdpStorageException - when there is a database operation failure.
        DeviceFingerprintException - when the token's fingerprint checksum does not match.
        PasswordManagerException - when the TOKEN domain is not logged in (using one of the password managers)
